page.title: 20LIFE STYLES CONTINUED
page.content: There is a wide variety of equipment in the homes in the area. The piece of equipment that most people want next was a micro-wave oven. The most used items were electric cookers, kettles and washing machines. Nearly every family owns a television,usually coloured. People prefer News and Current Affairs programmes, selecting from all channels. Not all households own radios. Music and The World at One were the most popular programmes. Most people listen at home, only a few listen at work. Cats and dogs, the most common pets, are kept mostly for company. The number of horses and ponies is significant. About half the people questioned said they went to Church only on special occasions. A quarter went frequently and usually locally. The rest never went to Church at all.
